constituent: life, This is Your Life, cell, drop, grow up
heisigComment: * As a primitive, we may think of a microscopic cell, that miraculous unit that grows up to become a living being.
heisigStory: A single drop added to the element for grow up gives us the character for life.
koohiiStory1: This is the first CELL of a human, the foundation of its entire LIFE, a small DROP that will GROW UP to form a complex organism.
koohiiStory2: Growing Up is just a Drop of our LIFE.
kunYomi: い.きる、い.かす、い.ける、う.まれる、う.まれ、うまれ、う.む、お.う、は.える、は.やす、き、なま、なま-、な.る、な.す、む.す、-う
readingExamples: 生活 (せいかつ), 発生 (はっせい), 先生 (せんせい), 生かす (い.かす), 生きる (い.きる), 生ける (い.ける), 生まれる (う.まれる), 生む (う.む), 生う (お.う), 生 (き), 生 (なま), 生える (は.える), 生やす (は.やす)
